title: Family's Honor
overview: Ha Dan Ah is very dignified and beautiful yet she also had a sad life. Dan Ah was married in her 20's, but her husband died in a car accident during their honeymoon. She is pursued by two men, a man from a rich family, Lee Kang Suk and a man who is younger than her, Jung Hyun Kyu. The drama chronicles how the Ha Family upholds their aristocratic reputation.
